items.text: full, just outside off, and he caresses a front-foot dive past mid-off's left
items.postText: Prasant NEPAL: "I think Nepali cricket is also capable to play against the team like BAN "
items.shortText: McCarthy to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: full, on off, and tapped with soft hands to point for a quick single
items.postText: Mushfiqur'sSoul: "For a sport with like 10 playing teams cricket sure has a big toxic fan culture. Yall love bringing other teams down and throwing the word minnow around like chill and enjoy the game"
items.shortText: McCarthy to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full on leg, and flicked to the leg side. But it takes a thick inside-edge off his bat and pad
items.shortText: McCarthy to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle, and pulled along the ground to Dockrell in the deep
items.postText: Terry Harpot: "@KARIM - Tamim is like Gayle, explosive but inconsistent... As he showed in the BPL, he was a baggage for most parts of the tournament for his team. But come the Finals, he repaid his team's fate. The pitches there and in India are either the same or flatter, so conditions won't matter. But he needs to get more consistent - if he does, he would be a GOAT in world cricket before soon :)"
items.shortText: McCarthy to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full, just outside off, and the slower ball is defended towards point. McCollum takes a tumble while trying to intercept
items.postText:
Shivam: "Everyone who is saying Bangladesh isn't good enough..just don't forget they were one of the semi-finalists of champions trophy (2017) in ENGLAND" -- True, but worth noting the rain-affected games in that group

Masum Billah: "Prasant Nepal, you made a very big call!"
items.shortText: McCarthy to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball from around the wicket. Lands just outside off, and fended off the back foot
items.shortText: Adair to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and he mistimes a punch towards the non-striker
items.shortText: Adair to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and pushed with the bat's open face to cover
items.postText: Jahin Shams Sak: "@Terry dude Tamim has the 4th best ODI batting average sincee 2015. Tamim was explosive and inconsistent but Tamim now looks to bat through"
items.shortText: Adair to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and fended off the back foot to cover. Enough time to pinch a single
items.shortText: Adair to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and tapped with the bat's open face to point
items.postText: Mahneel : "@Shivam, Bangladesh won only one match in the CT 2017 (which was a remarkable win nonetheless). It was a rather bizarre qualification to the semis."
items.shortText: Adair to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length, wide outside off, and Mushfiqur tees up to cut. Struck super hard, but goes straight to the fielder at point. Unlucky
items.shortText: Adair to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: mahfuj: "@terry harpot ......what kind of cinsistance needed you from tamim????..after 15 world cup his avg 54+..!!!!!.....you need more ???? last 2 year his avg 64 ...best avg by any opener.."
items.text: full and wide outside off, and he leans into a drive. Struck to deep extra cover
items.shortText: McCarthy to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on leg, and flicked nonchalantly off his legs. Fine leg runs across the boundary to try and cut it off, but even his diving effort isn't good enough
items.shortText: McCarthy to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, wide outside off, and cut to deep point. Shakib says no to the second run
items.shortText: McCarthy to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball on middle, and he slices a cut to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
items.shortText: McCarthy to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, wide outside off, and punched to cover point
items.shortText: McCarthy to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: 7UpGuy: "Come on Sakib you are ruining the 100+ strike rate for all bd batsman record. Raise your game lad."
items.text: length ball, outside off, and he muscles a cut to the fielder on the off-side boundary
items.shortText: McCarthy to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: slower ball punished! Ball holds up off the deck, and he frees his arms to hammer a cut for four
items.shortText: Adair to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length on middle, and pulled to Stirling at midwicket
items.postText: Arzoo: "I could feel the pain of Irish fans as the minnows call is somewhat harsh! However my friends, welcome to the big picture with big boys, you are a Test team now and will be scrutinized way more for every instance by media, supporters. So, be prepared to enjoy those comments which Tiger fans had been facing for long time. And I am a serious contender for a Bangladesh vs India Final. I am sure that will most sought/sold game for broadcasters and ICC everybody, win win for all!"
items.shortText: Adair to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on middle, and angling down leg. Flicked to fine leg
items.shortText: Adair to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: drilled off the back foot! Length ball from around the wicket, but he meets the ball near his chest and strikes an easy four
items.shortText: Adair to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and he punches a shot to deep point
items.postText: Mustafizur Rahm: "@7UpGuy, I think that's called sensible batting. No need to go for it from both ends yet! He has plenty of time to fix that strike rate!"
items.shortText: Adair to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on leg, and worked off his pads down to fine leg
items.postText: Eden Prime: "I personally think Afganistan will take a world cup before Bangladesh. Their progression from bottom feeder to challenging is the most impressive. Don't gang up on me I am Bangladeshi... except I am a realist."
items.shortText: Adair to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball, width offered, and cut to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
items.shortText: Rankin to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and he mistimes a straight drive. Stopped by Rankin on his followthrough
items.shortText: Rankin to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
